## Quick start

### Prerequisites

- [pixi](https://pixi.sh/latest/). Manages the environment.
- [Blender](https://www.blender.org) the core viz engine.


### Up and running

```sh
git clone https://github.com/zachcp/prettymol &&  cd prettymol

pixi run remove  # removes Blender's python
pixi run jupyter # starts Blender AND IPYTHON
```


### Complete Minimal Example

![](images/green_glow.png)

```python
%load_ext autoreload
%autoreload 2


from prettymol import draw, load_pdb    # basic fns
from prettymol import StructureSelector # used for selection
from prettymol import Repltools         # used for controlling Blender
from prettymol import Material          # access Material Propoerties
from prettymol import CartoonStyle,  SpheresStyle, SticksStyle  # MN Styles
from dataclasses import replace, fields  # for overriding defaults

# setup the repl
rt = Repltools()

# Load and process structure
structure = load_pdb("7xbu")
polymer = StructureSelector(structure).amino_acids().get_selection()
ligand = StructureSelector(structure).resname("MYN").get_selection()

# Create materials
surface_material =  Material()
cartoon_material =  Material()
sticks_material =  replace(
        Material(),
        **{'base_color': [0.15, 1, 0.15, 1],
           "emission_strength": 1,                  # try changing this
           "emission_color": [0.15, 1, 0.15, 1]})   # try changing this

sphere_style =  replace(
        SpheresStyle(),
        **{'as_mesh': True})


# print(sticks_material)

# Draw and position
draw(structure, CartoonStyle(), cartoon_material)
draw(ligand, sphere_style, sticks_material)
# draw2(structure, styles.SurfaceStyle(), surface_material)

rt.set_view_axis(distance=0.1)  # try changing this
rt.render_view()
```
